title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 on reviewing in NLP research
<|assistant|>

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 on reviewing in NLP research. These articles cover various aspects of reviewing in NLP research, including the challenges, best practices, and future directions
The Challenges of Peer Review in Natural Language Processing
This article discusses the challenges of peer review in NLP research, including the complexity of the field, the diversity of the research community, and the need for interdisciplinary collaboration
